mapper.select: select rno, bno, replyText, replier, regDate, updateDate from tbl_reply where bno =#{bno} and bno > 0 order by rno asc limit #{listDTO.skip}, #{listDTO.size}
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_reply (bno, replyText, replier) values (#{bno} , #{replyText}, #{replier})
mapper.select: select count(rno) from tbl_reply where bno = #{bno} and bno > 0
